title: Just looking for nice people to play with (Platinum V if rank matters)
body:
As the title suggests, I'm just looking for some people to play and enjoy the game with who, preferably, don't rage or quit when things are taking a turn for the worst and fight till the last breath. Rank doesn't really matter much to me, and feel free to ask me how to improve if you want to as well, even if I am just a lowly plat 5 and I'll probably do the same.  

If this takes a turn for the best, we can even form a ranked team. I play top mostly.

replies.body: hey . im gold 5 last year bronze still this year but rank dosent matter .. ill send u a friend request because finding nice people like you is rare and dude plat is high :) will join any ranked team thats made . look forward for some fun games .

I dont expect a reply, pretty ambitious of me, but if you feel like coaching me and having fun at the same time in normals only then feel free to add me. I am no where near your level (Bronze 1, former Silver 4) so i am not looking for ranked games from skill leveles so high like yours. Just a coach :P

if not have fun anyways
As long as you have a pleasant disposition, I'd be happy to help! Also, plat isn't that high XD I'm not too good myself.

awsome
IGN: D1sturbed, ill add you 

thanks heaps
im a bit nub but I don't rage and I don't giveup added you

Hey Man
Add me : BearKind
We are starting up a group of people who are looking for just that. So far there is six of us.
Message me when you add me
I'll happily join you, I play for fun and want to play with good people. Diamond5 if that matters
